summary: libwacom bug fix and enhancement update
details:
The libwacom packages contain a library that provides access to a tablet
model database. The libwacom packages expose the contents of this database to
applications, allowing for tablet-specific user interfaces. The libwacom
packages allow the GNOME tools to automatically configure screen mappings
and calibrations, and provide device-specific configurations.

Bug Fix(es) and Enhancement(s):

* Lenovo: Upstream libwacom fix for X1Y6 (AlmaLinux) (BZ#1965300)
